author: potuz
content: Is it only me or this server from time to time appears to have all channels outdated, I wake up and see as if I had unread messages in every channel, when it isn't the case

author: m.kalinin
content: It could be spammers' messages which have been removed, it turns channels into unread state with no new messages effectively existing in them

author: potuz
content: Yeah but really on every channel?

author: potuz
content: I haven't participated in many Discord servers, but this is the only one that suffers from this I think

author: m.kalinin
content: Not every, but I saw a lot of affected channels just recently. Apparently, this discord is pretty appealing to spammers

author: wingsofheaven
content: In this system, what happens when a smaller group of the users colludes with the corrupted centralized validators? Would it then still have connection to the DB, but just run slowly/inefficiently?

author: sky.cactus
content: It is assumed from the start that the centralized sequencer does all of the things the protocol allows them to do.
